page.title: 04 The Huntsman and Hounds
page.content: "The Huntsman and Hounds" is a public house on the main A144 Bungay to Halesworth road. Its nickname is the "Chequers" because it used to be a check-in post for all the coaches from Ipswich to Norwich. Mr and Mrs Batley live on the premises with their two children.The public rooms are the dining lounge and the bar. The family rooms are an upstairs lounge and two bedrooms. Downstairs there is a kitchen and a dining room. Mrs Batley cooks 400 meals a week and uses a microwave cooker.Mr Batley serves 1400 pints of beer a week. The pub is open from 10:30a.m. until 2:30p.m. and from 7:00p.m. until 11:00p.m.
